review: Exactly what I was looking for.  Lightning fast speed, which was my main concern considering my router is pretty far away from the family room where this is plugged in to the TV.  I have absolutely no connection problems.  Tons of apps and if you are a Prime member, there's really no reason to buy anything else.  It has ESPN3 which was important to me, as well as many kids apps that my 4 year old son loves.  Very easy to use.  Very easy to set up.  I had researched the Roku, Apple and others before buying this.  I am 100% satisfied and would recommend this to anyone.
